typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Project ID} as string,
		Context as string,
		{Type of event} as string,
		{Type of Participant} as string,
		Status as string,
		{Registration Date} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> source1
source1 derive(Email = 'NULL') ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		ProjectID as string,
		Context as string,
		{Type of platform} as integer,
		{SheTrades Project} as string,
		{Date of data collection} as integer,
		{First name} as string,
		{Last name} as string,
		Gender as string,
		{Year of birth} as integer,
		{Participant Country} as string,
		Email as string,
		{Job title} as string,
		{Professional status} as string,
		{Organization/ Company name} as string,
		{Type of entity} as string,
		{Organization Country} as string,
		City as string,
		Size as string,
		ISIC as string,
		{Please select the area of your activity} as string,
		HS as string,
		{Owner/ top manager gender} as string,
		{Owner/ top manager age} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
